Class GoodsBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.ElementsBoard
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.GoodsBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoodsBoard extends ElementsBoard
This class offers the capacity to change the number of goods held on a tile. It manages all the 4 possible colors of blocks in a single class.

  • Method Details

    • cantPlace

      public boolean cantPlace(Coordinate c, int qty)
      Check if a good is placeable in this box. It checks if the color is correct and if there are enough spaces inside this tile.
      Specified by:
      cantPlace in class ElementsBoard
      Parameters:
      c - coordinate to place the box
      qty - how many box to place
      Returns:
      true if the box is placeable here, false if not
